name: mdream
description: Convert HTML to Markdown using ultrahtml

scripts.flame: pnpm build && unbuild bench/bundle && clinic flame -- node bench/bundle/dist/string.mjs 10
scripts.bench:stream: pnpm build && unbuild bench/bundle && hyperfine --runs 100 'node bench/bundle/dist/stream.mjs' --warmup 3
scripts.bench:await: pnpm build && unbuild bench/bundle && hyperfine --runs 100 'node bench/bundle/dist/await.mjs' --warmup 3
scripts.bench:string: pnpm build && unbuild bench/bundle && hyperfine --runs 100 'node bench/bundle/dist/string.mjs' --warmup 3
scripts.test:wiki:file: pnpm build && cat test/fixtures/wikipedia-largest.html | node ./bin/mdream.mjs --origin https://en.wikipedia.org | tee test/wiki-markdown.md
scripts.test:wiki-small:file: cat test/fixtures/wikipedia-small.html | node ./bin/mdream.mjs --origin https://en.wikipedia.org | tee test/wiki-markdown.md
